sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import './App.css'; function App() { const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('home'); const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [typedText, setTypedText] = useState(''); const [typingIndex, setTypingIndex] = useState(0); const [visibleSkills, setVisibleSkills] = useState({}); const sections = useRef({ home: null, about: null, projects: null, skills: null, experience: null, education: null, contact: null }); // Typing animation logic useEffect(() => { const fullText = "print('Hello World!')"; if (typingIndex < fullText.length) { const timer = setTimeout(() => { setTypedText(fullText.substring(0, typingIndex + 1)); setTypingIndex(typingIndex + 1); }, 100); return () => clearTimeout(timer); } }, [typingIndex]); useEffect(() => { setupIntersectionObserver(); }, []); const setupIntersectionObserver = () => { const observer = new IntersectionObserver( (entries) => { entries.forEach((entry) => { if (entry.isIntersecting) { setActiveSection(entry.target.id); } }); }, { threshold: 0.5 } ); Object.values(sections.current).forEach(section => { if (section) observer.observe(section); }); }; const scrollToSection = (sectionId) => { sections.current[sectionId]?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); setIsMenuOpen(false); }; const toggleSkillsVisibility = (category) => { setVisibleSkills(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [category]: !prevState[category] })); }; // Sample data const profileData = { name: "Yashwanth R", title: "AI & Machine Learning Engineer", bio: "Building intelligent systems that learn and adapt. Passionate about deep learning, computer vision, and creating AI that makes a difference.", email: "yashwanth150204@gmail.com", phone: "+91 9345570940", location: "Coimbatore, India", social: { github: "https://github.com/Yashwanth1524", linkedin: "https://linkedin.com/in/yashwanth1524", twitter: "https://twitter.com/yashwanth" } }; const projects = [ { id: 1, title: "Neural Style Transfer", description: "Real-time style transfer using CNN and TensorFlow", technologies: ["Python", "TensorFlow", "CNN", "Flask"], github: "https://github.com/yashwanth/style-transfer", live: "https://style-transfer-demo.vercel.app" }, { id: 2, title: "Predictive Maintenance System", description: "ML system predicting equipment failures using sensor data", technologies: ["Python", "Scikit-learn", "XGBoost", "IoT"], github: "https://github.com/yashwanth/predictive-maintenance" }, { id: 3, title: "Sentiment Analysis API", description: "Real-time sentiment analysis for social media monitoring", technologies: ["Python", "Transformers", "FastAPI", "Docker"], github: "https://github.com/yashwanth/sentiment-api" } ]; const skills = { "Machine Learning": { description: "Developing and implementing ML algorithms to solve complex problems", items: ["TensorFlow", "PyTorch", "Scikit-learn", "OpenCV"] }, "Deep Learning": { description: "Building neural networks for advanced pattern recognition", items: ["CNN", "RNN", "Transformers", "GANs"] }, "Programming": { description: "Writing efficient and maintainable code across multiple languages", items: ["Python", "Java", "JavaScript"] }, "Web Development": { description: "Creating interactive and responsive web applications", items: ["React", "Node.js", "HTML/CSS", "Firebase"] } }; const experience = [ { company: "University of Malaya", position: "Research Intern - AI for Music Digitization", period: "Jul 2024 - Oct 2024", description: "Developed AI-based Optical Music Recognition system achieving 92% accuracy in digitizing historical musical sheets." } ]; const education = [ { institution: "Coimbatore Institute of Technology", degree: "M.Sc. Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning", period: "2021 - 2026", details: "CGPA: 7.89" } ]; return (

{/* About Section */}
sections.current.about = el}>

About Me

Get to know me better

I'm a passionate AI and Machine Learning student with expertise in developing intelligent systems. My work focuses on deep learning, computer vision, and creating practical AI solutions that solve real-world problems.

With experience in research and development, I've worked on projects ranging from music digitization to predictive maintenance systems. I thrive on challenges and enjoy pushing the boundaries of what's possible with AI.

{/* Projects Section */}
sections.current.projects = el}>

{project.title}

📁 GitHub {project.live && ( 🌐 Live Demo )}

{project.technologies.map(tech => ( {tech} ))}
))}

sections.current.skills = el}>

toggleSkillsVisibility(category)}>

{data.description}

))}

sections.current.experience = el}>

); } export default App;
